languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс победно вскидывает голову и довольно оглядывает мостик и всех присутствующих.{/n} "Служитель Инквизиции не станет врать на священном трибунале, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс победно вскидывает голову и довольно оглядывает мостик и всех присутствующих.{/n} "Служитель Инквизиции не станет врать на священном трибунале, не правда ли?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс победно вскидывает голову и довольно оглядывает мостик и всех присутствующих.{/n} "Служитель Инквизиции не станет врать на священном трибунале, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head up triumphantly and looks around the bridge and everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie during a sacred tribunal, would he?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se redresse triomphalement et regarde toutes les personnes présentes sur la passerelle.{/n} « Un serviteur de l'Inquisition ne mentirait pas lors d'un procès, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se redresse triomphalement et regarde toutes les personnes présentes sur la passerelle.{/n} « Un serviteur de l'Inquisition ne mentirait pas lors d'un procès, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希得意地扬起了头，环顾着旁听席与法庭里每个人。{/n}“身为审判庭的仆人，总不可能在神圣的法庭里撒谎，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希得意地扬起了头，环顾着旁听席与法庭里每个人。{/n}“身为审判庭的仆人，总不可能在神圣的法庭里撒谎，是吧？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは勝ち誇ったように頭を上げ、ブリッジとその場にいる全員を見渡した。{/n}「異端審問庁の従者が神聖な審問の場で嘘をつくはずがないだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは勝ち誇ったように頭を上げ、ブリッジとその場にいる全員を見渡した。{/n}「異端審問庁の従者が神聖な審問の場で嘘をつくはずがないだろう？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Triumphierend hebt Heinrix den Kopf und schaut in Richtung Brücke und alle Anwesenden.{/n} "Und ein Diener der Inquisition würde bei einer Anhörung vor einem heiligen Tribunal niemals lügen, oder?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Triumphierend hebt Heinrix den Kopf und schaut in Richtung Brücke und alle Anwesenden.{/n} "Und ein Diener der Inquisition würde bei einer Anhörung vor einem heiligen Tribunal niemals lügen, oder?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix levanta la cabeza con gesto triunfal y recorre con la mirada el puente y a todos los presentes.{/n} «Y un siervo de la Inquisición no mentiría a un tribunal sagrado, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix levanta la cabeza con gesto triunfal y recorre con la mirada el puente y a todos los presentes.{/n} «Y un siervo de la Inquisición no mentiría a un tribunal sagrado, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, zafer kazanmışçasına başını kaldırıp gözlerini köprünün ve orada bulunan herkesin üzerinde gezdiriyor.{/n} "Bir Engizisyon hizmetkârı, kutsal bir dava duruşmasında yalan söylemez, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head triumphantly and looks around the bridge and at everyone present.{/n} "A servant of the Inquisition would not lie at a sacred tribunal hearing, would he?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix başını zaferle kaldırıyor ve gözlerini köprünün ve orada bulunan herkesin üzerinde gezdiriyor.{/n} "Bir Engizisyon hizmetkârı, kutsal bir dava duruşmasında yalan söylemez, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
